name: Bayer CapSeal Advanced
description: In 2016 Bayer introduces its 3rd-generation CapSeal. By protecting our packaging with a special seal, we allow farmers to benefit by checking of the authenticity of the product in a smooth and easy way.  As manipulation can never be excluded, the App only gives an indication but no guarantee wheter the product is authentic or not.  Moreover a broken CapSeal indicates that the bottle has already been opened.
